One of the things he helped with was coffee production, which is now the main source of income for him and his small family.

This young man manages his plantation under the criteria for fair trade certification. This year he has decided to swap out old coffee plants for new ones on around 2.5 acres of land, for which he is requesting a loan so he can get the supplies that he needs and increase the revenue that his plantation generates.

Julio’s dream is to give his children better opportunities for growth; for this reason, he strives to improve the productivity of his plantation every day.

loans.use: to buy the supplies he needs to swap out the old coffee plants for new ones on an area of land, so he can improve his future income

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther works hard to support her family. Esther is widow and has a food vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 3 years now.

Esther has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.en:
Zoila faces considerable preparation for the post-harvest operations of her palay (rice) farm in Laning, Baliangao, Misamis Occidental. She wants to ensure that she will have ample time for the threshing, drying, storage and processing of her harvest to make way for another cropping season. 

She has presented her loan proposal to Paglaum MPC. Zoila hopes to save some of the profit she earns for emergencies.

loans.use: to pay for post-harvest operations.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a factory worker from Cavite. She has three children who are studying, and she is working hard to provide for their needs together with her husband, Rodel. She is one of the beneficiaries of the employment program at CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative*.

Susan works as an Assistant Production Line Leader. She conducts inspections and tests per the control plan, work instructions and procedures. She maintains good housekeeping at all times in the respective working areas. She is also responsible for the group of operators and carries out manpower utilization effectively to meet shipment dates.

One of the main dilemmas of employees like Susan is the improper balancing of their salaries with family expenses, and they have no access to savings or credit - a situation that has made them heavily indebted to usurious money lenders who capture their automated teller machine (ATM) cards as loan collateral.

For this reason, Susan is asking for your assistance to prevent her from being exposed to loan sharks. She has also previously accessed loans through CCT Credit Cooperative and she has had no problem repaying as the loan payments are deducted every pay day. She looks forward to your positive response and any amount coming from you will surely be of great help. She will use the loan to pay the tuition for her children since enrollment for another school year is fast approaching.

Susan dreams of giving her children a better life and future. She meets up with her co-fellowship** members to share stories of her work.



* The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for deployment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, qualify for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services.

** CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for the factory workers before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions and spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and post-working hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: to pay for the tuition of her children.

loans.name: Fareeda

texts.en:
Fareeda is a 40-year-old woman who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She has four sons and one daughter, who are in school. Her husband, who has been running his own clothes-selling business for 25 years, is responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household. He needs to purchase different kinds of clothing in bulk to resell, but lacks the financial means to do so. Fareeda is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so she can help her husband to purchase this clothing in bulk. Her husband can grow his business and earn more profit with the help of this loan. 

Fareeda is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk for her husband's clothing business.

loans.name: Onèse

texts.fr: Onèse, 50 ans, est mariée et  mère de huit enfants. Elle est propriétaire d’un commerce de produits alimentaires en gros et en détails. Son activité marche très bien dans la zone, elle a beaucoup de clients. Pour éviter des ruptures de stock elle cherche un microcrédit pour commander plus de marchandises que d’habitude. Avec son crédit, elle va doubler son stock de riz.
texts.en:
Onèse is 50 years old, married and mother to eight children.  She owns and runs a shop which sells food products on a wholesale and retail basis.  It is a very successful shop with many customers.

Onèse has requested this loan to increase her stockholding and avoid running out of stock.  She plans to double her supplies of rice.

loans.use: to double her stockholding of rice.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
A senhora Corolina é comerciante de 45 anos, casada mãe 4 filhos a estudar sustenta uma neta que vive com ela na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo diz vai comprar refrescos, cervejas, vinhos,  bolachas, acucar, feijao, massas, arroz, frangos, peixes para a sua barraca que esta na sua casa.
O projecto para o futuro crescer no negócio satisfazendo as necessidades de seus cliente.
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiência de fundos e faz xitique como forma de poupar mas diz que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para tal vai pagar pontualmente.
texts.en: Carolina is a 45 year old business-woman and a married mother to 4 children, who are all studying. She also cares for her grand-daughter who lives with her in her home. She plans to use this loan to buy soft drinks, beers, wines, cakes and pastries, sugar, beans, rice, chicken and fish for her stall which she runs from her home. In the future, she hopes to grow her business and to satisfy her customers' needs. The greatest challenge that she faces is her lack of money and so she is part of a xitique, an informal credit and savings group, as a means to saving her money. Owing to this challenge, she hopes to apply for further loans and, consequently, she is committed to punctually repaying this loan.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, beers, wines, cakes, sugar, beans, pastry, rice, chicken and fish.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
De 58 anos de idade é  casada e mãe de 02 filhos já maiores de idade já nas suas casas, sustenta um neto que vive com ela na casa própria.
Com o valor ira comprar cervejas, arroz, amendoim, refrescos, feijão, sabão para reforçar o seu negocio.
Para o futuro tem como planos crescer no negocio, ampliar o seu estabelecimento e adquirir mais um congelador para loja, diz ainda que com os créditos anteriores conseguiu comprar uma geleira e comprou também porcos para criação.
Diz que seu maior desafio é o financeiro e para superá-lo faz xitique como forma de poupar e que vai solicitar mais empréstimo para concretizar o seu sonho
texts.en: Ana is a 58 year old married mother to 2 children who are both fully grown and living independently. She cares for her grandson who lives with her. She plans to use this loan to buy beer, rice, peanuts, soft drinks, beans and soap to restock her business. In the future, she hopes to grow her business, to expand her shop and to buy a freezer to put in it. She says that she has used previous loans to help her to buy an ice-box and also some pigs to raise. The greatest challenge that she faces is in relation to her finances and she is part of a xitique, an informal credit and savings group, as a means to overcoming this situation by saving money. She also hopes to apply for further loans in the future so that she can fulfil her dreams.

loans.use: Compra de Cervejas, arroz, amendoim , refrescos, feijão, sabão

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. She supplements this income with earnings from her buy-and-sell dried fish business and raising pigs. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase seeds and other farm supplies.

Judith dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and other farm supplies

loans.name: Florita

texts.en:
Florita is 60 years old, married and has six children.

Florita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Florita requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Florita has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila works hard to support her family. Leonila is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing materials like bamboo, gasoline, fishing nets, etc.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like bamboo, gasoline, fishing nets, etc.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is married and has two children. She is 52 years old and lives in New Dapitan, Rizal. She earns a living offering manicure/pedicure services. She has been in this business for about 10 years and is well known for the nice quality of services she offers.

Lorena has already purchased some new manicure sets and was able to save. Her service is self-sustainable and has become profitable, with a net profit of about PHP 3,500 per month. Lorena is seeking a PHP 14,900 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase special items for her foot spa services. In her previous loans she has never had a delinquency.

Lorena is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to buy additional manicure/pedicure sets for her foot spa.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 36 year old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and four children. Her husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market for 14 years. Her husband is the only responsible one for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.

Nasreen's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories e.g. pieces of cloth, lace, needles and sewing machine accessories. Due to some financial constraints her husband is not in a position to buy these items for his business purposes. Therefore Nasreen has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount she will be able to financially assist her husband to buy these tailoring accessories. He will be able to fulfill his business needs, so that he can earn a more profitable income.

Nasreen is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy items such as cloth, lace, and sewing machine accessories to help her husband improve his tailoring business.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
O senhor Alberto  de 31 anos de idade, militar, casado e pai de 1  filha a frequentar o ensino primario sustenta 1 sobrinha que vive com ele na casa do servico.
Com o valor do emprestimo ira comprar cimento, ferro, blocos, areia, pedra para dar continuiddade a sua obra que ja esta na fase da viga.
Tem como projectos para o futuro oficializar aa sua relacao casando, aumentar a familia com mais de 2 filhos progredir na carreira profissional e terminar a sua obra.
Diz que o maior desafio e a insufiencia de fundos e para ultrapassa los poupa com xitique mensal e que va i solicitar mais emprestimos com os creditos anteriores conseguiu comprar electrodomesticos e iniciou a obra ate a fase actual.
texts.en: Alberto is a 31 year old soldier and a married father to a young daughter who attends primary school. He also cares for his niece who lives with him in his home, provided to him by the army. He plans to use this loan to buy cement, iron rods, building blocks, sand and stone in order to continue with building work on his home, which is currently still in its early phases. In the future, he plans to make his marriage official, to have a couple more children, to progress in his career and to finish the building work on his home. He says that the greatest challenge he faces is his lack of money and, as a way of overcoming this situation, he is part of a monthly xitique, an informal credit and savings group. He hopes to apply for further loans as he has used his previous loans to buy white goods for his home and to begin the building work undertaken so far.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron rods, building blocks, sand and stone

loans.name: Merrylou

texts.en:
Merrylou is a 29 years old and married. She is engaged in a gardening business, specifically an onion string garden. She sells to her neighbors and a nearby market to earn an income.

Merrylou aims to increase her income in preparation for having a child. She needs to have a good harvest of onion strings to have a better income, that's why she needs financial assistance to buy fertilizer for the onion string garden. She decided to take a loan at GDMPC.

Merrylou plan for the future is to have her own small house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her onion string garden.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 48 years old, and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family.

Marilyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of items to sell like canned goods, chips, etc.

Marilyn has borrowed and repaid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 8 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Marilyn aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of items to sell like canned goods, chips, etc.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza es una joven emprendedora de 29 años, que vive en una comunidad rural al norte de Nicaragua. Es madre soltera de un niño de 4 años de edad, el cual asegura es el motor que cada día la motiva a trabajar y ser mejor para modificar su condición económica.

Este año, ella está solicitando un financiamiento para comprar los insumos que necesita para renovar una manzana de café, y con ello incrementar la producción que tiene de este rubro y por ende sus ingresos.

El sueño de Maritza es asegurar a su hijo un mejor futuro, por lo que se ha propuesto renovar y ampliar su área de café, lo cual está segura podrá lograr con este tipo de inversiones, y con el trabajo que ella realice.
texts.en:
Maritza is 29 years old and an entrepreneur. She lives in a rural community in the north of Nicaragua. She is a single mother to a four-year-old boy, Martiza’s motivation is to work every day and to be better and improve her financial situation.

This year, Maritza is applying for a loan in order to buy supplies that she needs to look after a block of coffee. She can thus increase production and, as a consequence of this, her income.

Maritza’s dream is to guarantee a better future for her son. She is therefore planning to expand her coffee crops, which she can achieve by investing this loan and working hard.

loans.use: to buy coffee supplies to look after coffee crops.

loans.name: Cristina Beatriz

texts.es:
Cristina, es una mujer soltera, vive con su madre, aprendió de su familia a trabajar muy duro para subsistir, su negocio se trata de elaborar tortas, hamburguesas, etc., además ofrece a sus clientes variedad de bebidas, trabaja de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, por el momento no presenta dificultades en el desempeño de sus actividades.
Necesita de un crédito para comprar pan, embutidos, tomates, condimentos, gaseosas, jugos, etc., está inversión le permitirá tener mayor productividad y dar un buen servicio a sus clientes, sus esperanzas son que la demanda crezca y que su situación económica sea estable.
El sueño de Cristina es ampliar su negocio para tener recursos económicos que serán de ayuda para cambiar su estilo de vida y cuidar de su madre.
texts.en:
Cristina is single and lives with her mother. She learned from her family to work very hard to get by. Cristina has a business making pies, hamburgers and other foodstuffs. She also sells a variety of drinks to customers, working from 7am to 5pm. She currently has no difficulties in her work.

Cristina needs this loan in order to buy bread, cold meats, tomatoes, condiments, fizzy drinks, juices and more; this investment will allow Cristina to increase productivity and provide good service. Cristina hopes that demand grows and that her financial situation will become stable.

Cristina’s dream is to expand her business in order to have the money to help improve her living conditions and to look after her mother.

loans.use: to buy bread, cold meats, tomatoes, condiments, fizzy drinks, juices and more; this investment will allow Cristina to increase productivity.

loans.name: Grupo La Cuchilla 2 Group

texts.es:
María es una mujer  de  39 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de cuatro hijos de las edades entre 15 y 25 años de edad, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de san Antonio.
María (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa color melón) con el afán de generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica desde hace cuatro años, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la crianza de pollos y marranos.
Gracias a la amabilidad con la que María atiende a sus clientes  su negocio tiene mucha demanda, es por ello que ella ahora se ha dado cuenta que deberá invertir un poco más para poder cubrir mejor las necesidades de los clientes, pero lamentablemente ella no tiene el capital suficiente es por eso que solicita un crédito para poder comprar cortes, güipiles, fajas y delantales.
María tiene las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para poder mejorar su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria, 39, is married and has a lovely family of four children, between the ages of 15 and 25.  They live in a community in San Antonio.

In order to earn an income to support her family, Maria (first on the left in the picture, wearing a melon colored top) buys and sells typical clothing and has been in business for four years.  But in order to increase her income she also raises chickens and pigs.  Because of her attentive customer service, her business is in high demand, so she realizes now that she should invest a little more to meet customer needs.  Unfortunately, she does not have enough capital to do so and therefore is requesting a loan to buy skirt fabric, blouses, waistbands and aprons.

Maria hopes to receive the loan so she can improve her business and income.

loans.use: To buy skirt fabric, blouses, waistbands and aprons.

loans.name: Benilda

texts.es:
Benilda, utilizo el préstamo anterior para sembrar maíz para consumo familiar y para elaborar la venta de tortillas, los resultados han sido positivos, su familia tiene un mejor entorno y sus ingresos son mayores.
Necesita de un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas y semilla de maíz mejorada para sembrar en la próxima temporada, Benilda está satisfecha por los resultados al utilizar créditos y por la facilidad de pago que le brinda la institución.
texts.en:
Benilda used her previous loan to plant corn for family consumption and for making tortillas to sell.  The results have been positive and her family life has improved, as well as her income.

She is in need of a new loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and corn seed for the upcoming planting season.  Benilda is satisfied with the loan results and easy payment terms offered by the institution.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and corn seeds for the upcoming season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy supplies to renew part of his coffee crop to increase income.

loans.name: Willian René

texts.es:
Willian es un hombre de 29 años, él está muy agradecido por el crédito anterior pues gracias a ello logro comprar su máquina de estampado y ahora su pequeño negocio ya les ofrece a los clientes vasos con estampados y ahora sus ingresos han mejorado, pero él ahora solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar telas e hilos para elaborar camisolas y satisface mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Willian confía en que este nueva inversión le beneficiara a que su negocio de venta de implemento deportivo siga mejorando, para poder comprar un terreno y construir otra casa.
texts.en:
Willian, 29, is very grateful for his previous loan because thanks to it he was able to buy a stamping machine and now his small business offers stamped cups.  His income has increased and now he is requesting an new loan to buy fabrics and threads to make t-shirts to meet customer demand.

Willian believes this new investment will benefit his business by improving sales of sporting goods so he can buy land and build another house.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and threads to make sport t-shirts.

loans.name: Maria Vilma

texts.es: Maria de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo su hija, ella se dedica a cultivar la tierra siembra maíz y maicillo, tiene más de 40 años de experiencia en esta actividad e inicio con capital propio su familia le ayuda en las siembras, comercializa sus productos con los comerciantes de la zona, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 62, lives in her own house with her husband and daughter.  She grows corn and millet and has over 40 years' experience in the trade, having started out with her own capital.  Her family helps with the planting and she sells her produce to merchants in the area.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc. and earn more income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Mijgona

texts.ru: Мичгона из Хамадони. Она замужем и мать двоих сыновей. Ее мужу 35 лет,  он занимается растениеводством, и свободное время предоставляет услуги такси. Ей 30 лет и она дехканка. Очень мало встречаются дехканы  в таком юном возрасте. Дехканы очень трудолюбивые, и они любить зарабатывать своим честно нажитым трудом.  У Мичгоне есть собственный земельный участок, на который она трудиться уже 5 года.  Мичгона получила этот опыт от родителей, она очень благодарна им. Большую часть времени она отдает  работе, чтобы зарабатывать и прокормить свою семью. Мичгона хочет получить богатый урожай и старается всеми способами. Для этой цели она просит кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений.
texts.en:
Mijgona is from Hamadoni. She is married and has two sons. Her husband is 35 years old. He earns a living by cultivating plants, and also offers taxi services on the side. She is 30 years old and is a farmer. There are not many farmers who are so young. Farmers are very hardworking, and they love to make a living through honestly acquired work. 

Mijgona owns her own land lot, on which she has toiled for five years. Mijgona got this experience from her parents, and she is very thankful to them. She gives a large part of her time to work so that she can earn a living and feed her family. 

Mijgona wants to get a rich harvest and is trying all methods to achieve this. For this goal, she requests a loan to buy mineral fertilisers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilisers and cultivate the land with them.

loans.name: Dinora Elizabeth

texts.es: Dinora de 49 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y jugos naturales por las noches, clienta tiene una amplia experiencia en las ventas pues tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse a esa actividad con la cual ha podido salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi seguir dándole a su hija lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Dinora is 49 years old. She is a single mother and owns a house where she lives with her daughter. Dinora sells tortillas and natural juices at night. She has a vast experience in sales, since she has been in business for more than twenty years. This has helped her and her family to get ahead.

Dinora is requesting a loan to buy corn by the quintal [1 quintal = 100 lb.] and lime to be able to continue with her sales and give her daughter everything she might need, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime.

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es: Don Mario de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijas, el cliente tiene como actividad principal la crianza de pollos de engorde y la venta de cabras, comercializa los pollos cada 5 semanas en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado para los pollos y así seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Mario, 52, owns a house where he lives with his wife and two daughters. His main activity is raising broilers and selling goats. He sells the broilers every five weeks at different local markets.

Mario is requesting a loan to buy feed for the broilers and continue with his work, which is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy feed for his broilers.

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es:
Marcelo es un padre de familia de 39 años de edad, este humilde hombre está muy agradecido por el crédito al que se le dio la oportunidad de acceder, pues gracias a ello logro comprar sus semillas de papa y abono químico, el cuenta que obtuvo muy buena cosecha y con ello muy buenas ganancias, ahora su cultivo a incrementando. Él ahora  nuevamente se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar sus semillas de papa y fertilizantes para poder cultivar en esta temporada.
El gran sueño de Marcelo es poder mejorar su casa para que su familia tenga un hogar digno.
texts.en:
Marcelo is a 39-year-old father. He is a humble person and appreciates the opportunity of receiving a loan, since he was able to buy potato seeds and chemical fertilizers. He says that he got a very good harvest and profits. His plantation is growing now.

Marcelo needs to request another loan to buy potato seeds and fertilizers for this sowing season. His biggest dream is to make some home improvements in order to give his family a dignified home.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Julio Anival

texts.es: Julio de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el posee una carpintería donde se dedica a la elaboración de muebles de madera, cliente tiene 18 años de experiencia en la actividad la cual inicio con capital propio, comercializa sus producto durante todo el año en las comerciales que están cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como madera, barniz, pintura, clavos, y demás materiales para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Julio is 43 years old. He owns a house where he lives with his wife and two children. He has a carpenter’s shop where he makes furniture. He has been doing this for eighteen years and started his business with his own money. He sells his products all year round to local businesspeople.

Julio is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as wood, varnish, paint, nails, and other materials needed to continue with his activity and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood, varnish, paint, and nails.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es: Rosa de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo sus hijos ya son independientes, ella se dedica a trabajar en la tierra sembrando maíz y frijol tiene 5 años de experiencia su esposo le ayuda en las siembras, vende sus cosechas en los pueblos aledaños, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, entre otras cosas y asi continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is 47 years old. She owns a house where she lives with her husband. Her children are independent now. Rosa works the land; she grows corn and beans. She has a five-year experience and her husband helps her to sow. She sells her harvests in surrounding towns.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as chemical and organic fertilizers, and pesticides. She will be able to continue with this activity, which leaves her good profits.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as chemical and organic fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Bien Etre Group

texts.fr:
Mme  ASSETA PATRICIA est responsable du groupe BIEN ETRE. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus  âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a 11 ans. 04 enfants vont à l’école et elle a 10 personnes en charge.
Mme vend des pagnes simples, pagnes tissés et chaussures  depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés de son quartier.
Avec l’argent octroyé, elle veut acheter  02pièces de pagnes et 02douzaines de chaussures.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices pour renforcer son activité et aider le mari à payer la scolarité des enfants. Elle ambitionne  devenir grande commerçante et pouvoir voyager pour acheter ses marchandises.
texts.en:
Asseta Patricia is the leader of the Bien Etre Group. She is a married mother to three children. Her eldest is 22 years old and her youngest is 11 years old. All of her children are currently receiving an education and she has 10 people living under her care.

Asseta Patricia has been selling different varieties of pagne cloth and shoes for the past three years. She gets her supplies from the local markets.

With this loan, she wants to purchase two sheets of traditional pagne cloth and two dozen pairs of shoes.

She wants to use the profits from this loan to strengthen her business and to assist her husband with paying their children's school fees. Her ambition is to become a successful vendor and to be able to travel further afield to purchase her merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase two sheets of traditional pagne cloth and two dozen pairs of shoes

loans.name: Blanca Marlene

texts.es: Blanca de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella tiene un comedor donde vende todos los días y hace diferentes platos de comidas también tiene empleado que le ayudan en las ventas, tiene mas de 8 años de tener su negocio e inicio con capital propio, gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda de su esposo es como ha logrado salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos, carnes, verduras, frutas,  refrescos, entre otras cosas y así poder  variar su menú de comida para pode tener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is 37 years old, and she lives in her own home together with her husband and daughter. 

She has a dining room where she sells food that she prepares every day. She also has a person employed to help her with the sales. She started this business over eight years ago with her own capital, and she's gotten ahead through her work and with her husband's help.

Blanca is requesting the loan to buy chicken, meats, vegetables, fruits, beverages, and more, so that she can vary the dishes on the menu, increase her income, and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meats, vegetables, fruits, beverages, and more.

loans.name: Ruth Noemi

texts.es: Doña Ruth de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo quien vende frutas, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas tiene más de 6 años de dedicarse a esta actividad y gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda de su esposo es como ha logra salir adelante, Doña Ruth quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo y puerta ya que están bastante deteriorados pero ya que no cuenta con capital para realizarlo solicita un crédito para  la compra de laminas, polines, una puerta y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su esposo puedan vivir mas seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Ruth is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her husband who sells fruit. She makes a living selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas). She has been doing this job for more than 6 years and thanks to her job and the help of her husband she has been able to get ahead. 

Ruth wants to improve her home by changing the roof and door since they are rather deteriorated. Since she does not have the money to do this, she is asking for a loan to buy metal sheets, poles, a door and to pay labor so that she and her husband can live more safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, poles, a door and to pay labor.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Don carlos de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, el se dedica  la siembra de maíz, frijol y maicillo, además es albañil de profesión, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc.  y asi poder empezar sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 55 years old, and he lives in his own home with his spouse and three children. 

He earns a living planting corn, beans and sorghum. He is also a construction worker by trade.

Carlos is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control products and more to begin planting the crops, this being his only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control products, etc.

loans.name: Maricela Lucía

texts.es:
Maricela es una mujer de 22 años de edad, es casada  tiene una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 3 meses y 3 años, está hermosa familia vive en una comunidad de Totonicapán.
Maricela con el objetivo de obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa de dedica a la compra y venta de ropa usada, esta actividad lo realiza ella desde hace 14 años.
El negocio de Maricela es de bastante ayuda para los pobladores pues la situación económica es muy crítica y mucha gente no tiene la oportunidad de comprar ropas nuevas, es por eso que Maricela necesita surtir mejor su negocio para satisfacer mejor la necesidad de la clientela, por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder mejorar su servicio.
Maricela tiene las esperanzas de poder construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Maricela is a 22 year old woman. She is married and has a lovely family of two children of the ages of 3 months and 3 years. This beautiful family lives in a community of Totonicapán. Maricela makes a living by buying and selling used clothing, with the goal of getting her income and supporting her husband with the household expenses. She has done this job for 14 years. 

Maricela's business is a great help to the residents because the economic situation is very critical and many people do not have the opportunity to buy new clothes. This is why Maricela needs to stock her business better in order to better satisfy the need of the clientele. For that reason, she is asking for a loan to improve her service. Maricela has hopes of being able to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy and sell second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: В городе Душанбе многие девушки и женщины занимаются рукоделием и шитьем. Одна из мастериц Душанбе это Фируза. Фируза шьет шторы и берет заказы. Кроить и шить это ее любимое и приятное дело. Швейное дело ей как воздух, и без нее она не сможет дышать. Несмотря на свой возраст, она трудится все время, чтобы прокормить своих детей. Фирузе 27 лет, и она  в городе Душанбе живет вместе троими детьми. Дети еще маленькие.  Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, по причине что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. Фируза 7 лет занято этой деятельностью. Она решила сумму от кредита потратить на швейную машинку. И продолжить свое любимое занятие.
texts.en:
In the city of Dushanbe many young ladies and women do needlework and sewing. Firuza is one of these experts in Dushanbe. Firuza sews curtains takes requests. Cutting and sewing is pleasant and enjoyable to her. The sewing business is like air to her; without it she will not be able to breathe. In spite of her age, she works all the time in order to feed her children. 

Firuza is 27 years old, and she lives together with her three children in Dushanbe. Her children are still young. Her husband is working in Russia because he could not find a suitable job in Tajikistan. Firuza has been engaged with this business for seven years. She has decided to spend the money from the loan on a sewing machine, and continue doing the work she loves.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine in order to continue doing what she loves.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Это красивая женщина Дилором. Она самостоятельная  и активная женщина. Ей 27 лет. У нее один 7 летный сын. Сын учится в средней школе. Дилором живет вместе сестренкой, отцом, матерью и сыном в городе Душанбе. Она сама зарабатывает. Дилором предоставляет услуги швеи. Уже 6 лет Дилором шьет национальное платье по заказу. Сейчас ее сын более, ему надо лечиться. Дилором сильно расстроена, что у нее нет такое количество сумма денег для лечения сына. Она не знала, кому обращаться и обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Дилором будет очень рада за Вашу помощь.
texts.en:
This beautiful woman is Dilorom. She is an independent and active woman. She is 27 years old. She has a seven year old son. Her son studies in middle school. 

Dilorom lives together with her younger sister, father, mother, and son in Dushanbe city. She earns her own living. Dilorom offers tailoring services. Dilorom has made national dresses to order for six years. 

Now her son is ill, and he needs treatment. Dilorom is very upset that she does not have enough money for her son's treatment. She did not know who to turn to for help, and appeals to you for a loan. Dilorom will be very happy for your help.

loans.use: to get medical treatment for her son.

loans.name: Julio Eduardo

texts.es: Julio vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el cliente se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde muy pequeño ya que sus padres le enseñaron ese trabajo, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, pesticidas y pago de parcela ya que no cuenta con tierra propia para cultivar y asi podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julio lives in his own house with his wife and his two children. He has made a living growing basic grains since he was very little because his parents taught him this work. He sells his products in the different markets found close to his house. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and to pay for the plot of land since he does not have his own land to cultivate, and this way he could give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to pay for the plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de fruta y antojitos como yuca, enchiladas papas, etc. inicio su negocio con capital propio desde hace 5 años, la joven vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra frutas, aderezos, yuca, papas, maíz, verduras, entre otras cosas que necesita para preparar los alimentos y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The young woman, whose face has been pixelated because she is 29 years old and lives in a high-risk area, works in the sale of fruit and snacks such as yucca, enchiladas, potatoes, etc. She began her business with her own capital 5 years ago. She lives in her own house with her two children and her husband. She is asking for the loan to purchase fruit, seasonings, potatoes, corn, vegetables, and other things that she needs to prepare her foods and to be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, seasonings, yucca, potatoes, corn, vegetables, and other things.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la ara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de licuados y jugos naturales desde hace 1 año su negocio está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada y tiene muchos clientes, la joven vive con sus padres y su hermano en casa propia, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de frutas, leche, azúcar, vainilla, etc. todo por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi ayudar a sus padres en los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been pixilated because she is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk area, has worked selling smoothies and natural juices for the past 1 year. Her business is located near where she lives in a highly trafficked area and she has many customers. She lives with her parents and brother in their own house. She is asking for the loan to purchase fruit, milk, sugar, vanilla, etc., all in bulk to be able to continue with her work and in this way help her parents with the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, milk, sugar, vanilla, etc., all in bulk.

loans.name: Randa

texts.en:
Randa is a 24-year-old Lebanese married woman. She has worked as a private teacher since 2012. She chooses this profession because she feels that she is helping students to get the needed education. She prepared a special room in her house where she receives her students and equipped it with required materials and supplies. 

Today, she is applying to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to buy a new laptop to help her in her work and to improve her teaching skills. She is very optimistic about her future and wishes to receive more students with the coming school season.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop

loans.name: Gulshanbi

texts.en:
Gulshanbi is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1981. She is living in a big village with her family. She is married and has four children.

Gulshanbi has 15 years experience of trading in domestic market vegetables, greens, dairy products and fruits. She considers that the actuality of doing a business of selling and buying products is an easy way of keeping and transferring her goods from the market where she buys to the domestic market where she sells. 

She is a goal oriented, honest and capable person. Gulshanbi gains enough money to feed her family and to spend on family needs such as food and clothing.

She needs money for working capital to buy the next assortment of products for selling. Gulshanbi asked for help from Kiva lenders to buy fruits, vegetables, dairy products and greens. She hopes to be supported because this loan will give her an opportunity to earn money for family needs and a living.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, dairy products and greens

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business buying and selling bamboo in the Philippines.

Gina requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more bamboo to sell.  She has been in this business for 7 years now, and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo to sell

loans.name: Jofe

texts.en:
Jofe is 32 years old and married with one child still in school. Jofe works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, spices, drinks, etc.

Jofe has been in this business for ten years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, spices, drinks, etc
